product_name: Royal Robbins Metro Stretch Jacket - Women's
long_description: A great piece to throw in your yoga bag or take traveling, the women's Royal Robbins Metro Stretch Jacket is lightweight, resists wrinkles and dries fast. Oh, and it looks cool too. Zip-up front extends through high funnel neck for lightweight warmth. Collar/funnel neck features a tie closure; Back has a pleat and side panels show a reverse fabric for style. Fabric offers light stretch and UPF 50+ sun protection. Royal Robbins Metro Stretch Jacket for women offers reflective trim at the back yoke for added visibility when crossing the street in dim light.
short_description: A great piece to throw in your yoga bag or take traveling, the women's Royal Robbins Metro Stretch Jacket is lightweight, resists wrinkles and dries fast. Oh, and it looks cool too.
